title: Glen Echo Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Operating Hours & Seasons            Operating Hours & Seasons       The grounds of Glen Echo Park are open daily from 6 a.m. to 1 a.m. (the next day).  The National Park Service offices are closed on the following holidays: Veterans Day, Thanksgiving Day, December 25th, New Year's Day,  Martin Luther King Jr Day, and President's Day.   There are many different activities that take place at the park throughout the year and during different hours.  See more information below.   Ranger Station April through September: located in the lower level of the red brick building next to the carousel.        Dentzel Carousel Ranger-led tours of the historic 1921 Dentzel Carousel are free and offered year round by advanced reservation (staffing permitting) call 301-320-1400. Tickets to ride the carousel are $1.25 per ride. Hours of operations: May - August: Wednesday-Friday from 10:00 am to 2:00 pm, Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm September: Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm Enjoy the carousel on these additional days and nights: Memorial Day, Fourth of July, and Labor Day, 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm Friday, August 31 (Labor Day Art Show Reception), 7:00 pm to 9:00 pm **Hours are subject to change. Visit www.glenechopark.org/dentzel-carousel for the most up-to-date hours and information.      Social Dances in the Spanish Ballroom Dancing takes place at Glen Echo Park year round! For the latest information on the social dancing schedule and activities in the Spanish Ballroom, call the park's event hotline at 301-634-2222 or visit www.glenechopark.org/social-dances.   Art Classes Art classes are offered year round and schedules vary. For more information, visit www.glenechopark.org or call 301-634-2222. Copies of the class and events catalog are available throughout the park grounds.   Galleries and Art Studios There are a number of art studios and galleries that operate year round. Visit www.glenechopark.org for the most up-to-date schedules and information.   Children's Theater Shows Glen Echo Park has two resident children's theater groups that offer year round entertainment for kids of all ages. The Puppet Company - For the latest information and show schedule, call 301-320-6668 or 301-634-5380 or visit www.thepuppetco.org. Adventure Theatre - For the latest information and show schedule, call 301-634-2270 or visit www.adventuretheatre.org.      These are just some of the many activities that Glen Echo Park offers throughout the year. Explore more of this National Park Service website or visit www.glenechopark.org to find even more opportunities!
